name: Witches and Kittens
description:
Cassandra used to be a happy witch before the Inquisition took her life. Now she only has her cats to help her seek for vengeance!

Witches and kittens is an action RPG where you play as Cassandra, a dead witch who has no other choices then possessing her cats in order to follow her quest for revenge.

You'll use the different elemental abilities of every cat to fight your enemies, solve puzzles and explore the world.

● Attack combinations: Choose 4 attacks from numerous powers with
interconnected effects and discover the best combinations.
● Collect dozens of playable characters: Dozens of cats with different skills that influence your approach to the fight can be found in the game.
● Semi-random progression: At each level, the current cat can choose from 3
different attacks leading each cat to evolve differently.
● Challenging puzzles: Numerous dungeons full of secrets protect the various artefacts. The player will need to solve those mysteries in order to access the castle of the Great Inquisition.
